definition: to alter one's fate/to improve one's luck (e.g. by changing one's name or phone number)

sentences.english: Crystal is also a change in the character learning something shipped.
sentences.chinese: 水晶也是八字学问中一项改运的东西。

definition: to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
casting a couple's fortune based on their bithdates (old)
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
to propitiate the god of the current year, Tai Sui 太歲|太岁[Tai4 sui4]
misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
